entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
